briefTitle: Surgical Site Infections After Liver Transplantation Based on Perioperative Antibiotics

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients â‰¥ 18 years of age.
* Eligible for liver transplantation by UVA standard protocol.
* First-time transplantation.
* No active infections - requiring antibiotics - excluding antifungals.

Exclusion Criteria:

* All patients \< 18 years of age.
* Previous liver transplantation.
* Active infections - requiring antibiotics.
* Allergy to all standard peri-operative antibiotics (piperacillin/tazobactam or UVA standard alternatives for Penicillin allergic patients: ciprofloxacin and vancomycin).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Development of Surgical Site Infections
outcomeMeasures.description: development of surgical site infection, including superficial and deep incisional and organ space surgical site infections

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Post-operative Fever
outcomeMeasures.description: fever above 38.5 degrees Celsius 24 hours after the end of the liver transplant

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Elevated White Blood Count (WBC)
outcomeMeasures.description: above 15,000 within 24hours after the end of the liver transplant

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Nosocomial Infection
outcomeMeasures.description: diagnosis of any new infection other than an SSI within 30 days from surgery

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Graft Loss
outcomeMeasures.description: complete loss of liver function in recipient

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subjects With Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: death within 30 days of liver transplant
